name: ZooScan Holo-Mero Plankton (SCHPM1)
description: Plankton lifeforms from dataset https://www.vliz.be/en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=4687. The data was accessed via the emodnet_biology parquet on EDITO. Includes holo- and mero-plankton lifeforms and is used for PH1 indicator calculations.

name: ZooScan Holo-Mero Plankton (SNS)
description: Plankton lifeforms from dataset https://www.vliz.be/en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=4687. The data was accessed via the emodnet_biology parquet on EDITO. Includes holo- and mero-plankton lifeforms and is used for PH1 indicator calculations.
